name.title: Name
name.description: Name by which this variable is referenced throughout the stage.

initialValue.title: Initial Value
initialValue.description: The initial value for this variable when the stage is loaded.

perTurnUpdate.title: Pre Input Update
perTurnUpdate.description: The value this variable will be set to at the start of the user's next input.

postInputUpdate.title: Post Input Update
postInputUpdate.description: The value this variable will be set to after the user's input is processed (after classifiers have run).

preResponseUpdate.title: Pre Response Update
preResponseUpdate.description: The value this variable will be set to at the start of the bot's next response.

postResponseUpdate.title: Post Response Update
postResponseUpdate.description: The value this variable will be set to after the bot's response is processed (after classifiers have run).
